name: VR Practical Shooting
summary:
Release date 20 November 2021

VR Practical Shooting is a sandbox experience built for those who are interested in competition shooting and sandbox shooters. There are various free ranges, competition mode with detailed scoring, all using realistically modelled firearms and innovative controls to closely mimic the real thing in ways that feels natural. 

Join the discord server for feedback and suggestions: https://discord.me/blobworks
Join the YouTube channel for frequent devlogs:...
